title: 375: Bekah’s Sugar Baby Past!
itunes:title: 375: Bekah’s Sugar Baby Past!
description:
Bekah is back and The Broads spill! They chat Jess’ current struggle, Bekah having scurvy, being scared of absolutely everything, past jobs, Bekah’s sugar baby past and how it’s connected to The Bachelor, Jess getting mad at men in Vegas, almost getting kicked out of the club, Bekah’s trip to Nicaragua, Jess & Evan’s 10 year wedding anniversary and vow renewals, and more!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***CARE/OF: Go to TakeCareof.com and enter code CHATTY50 for 50% off your first order!

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY130 and use code CHATTY130 to get $130 off, plus free shipping!
